title: Rooster Finds Gold
description:
How can a little rooster get a greedy king to listen to him? Will he succeed? Listen to Kim telling this interactive story from Iraq and find out.

If you'd like to support the show you can find us on our Ko-fi page - HERE or subscribe to our channel in Apple Podcasts.

See acast.com/privacy for privacy and opt-out information.
